shortdesc.ph: Callback when successfully rejoining a channel.
Occurs when the user successfully rejoins the channel.
Callback when successfully rejoined a channel.
Callback when successfully rejoined a channel.

p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, int elapsed)? onRejoinChannelSuccess;
public virtual void OnRejoinChannelSuccess(RtcConnection connection, int elapsed) {}

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: Sometimes due to network issues, the client may lose connection with the server. The SDK automatically reconnects, and this callback is triggered upon successful reconnection.
Due to network issues, the client may lose connection with the server. The SDK will attempt to reconnect automatically. This callback is triggered when the reconnection succeeds.
Sometimes, due to network issues, the client may lose connection with the server. The SDK will automatically reconnect and trigger this callback upon successful reconnection.
Due to network issues, the client may lose connection with the server. The SDK will attempt to reconnect automatically. This callback is triggered after a successful reconnection.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the user who rejoined the channel.
The time interval (in milliseconds) from calling the method to the triggering of this callback.
Time elapsed (ms) from calling to the triggering of this callback.
Time interval (ms) from calling to triggering this callback.
Time interval (ms) from the call to to the triggering of this callback.
